page.title: 07SEMI-DETACHED HOUSE, HARROW.
page.content: The{Artisans, Labourers and General {Dwellings Company Housing}is the real name for Artizan's Housing. This company is said to be one of the most successful housing companies ever. Between 1865 and 1905, this company solved London's housing problems although its founder, William Austin, could not even read or write. Artizan semi-detached houses in {Pinner,}built during the 1930's, are quite large and spacious, containing three bedrooms, two reception rooms, a kitchen, a bathroom and a lavatory. They have{high pitched roofs}with one {main chimney}and a{side chimney.}Among the tiles are some glass ones which act as a{skylight}for the attic. Although they were very modern for their time, they still used the old {sash windows}instead of the newer casement windows.
